scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && cp -rf Overview Connectors DashboardAttribution DashboardPaid DashboardPaidCampaigns AnaluseCampaign dist/
scripts.dev: nodemon -e html,css,js,svg,json --ignore dist --exec "npm run build && node server.js"
scripts.deploy: docker build -t asia-south1-docker.pkg.dev/mavenai-stage/cloud-run-source-deploy/dashboard-app:latest . && docker push asia-south1-docker.pkg.dev/mavenai-stage/cloud-run-source-deploy/dashboard-app:latest && gcloud run deploy dashboard-app --image=asia-south1-docker.pkg.dev/mavenai-stage/cloud-run-source-deploy/dashboard-app:latest --region=asia-south1 --project=mavenai-stage --allow-unauthenticated
